actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to require States to pass along to individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under the Federal-State public assistance programs or under certain other Federal programs, and who are entitled to social security benefits, the full amount of the 1972 and 1974 increases in such benefits, either by disregarding such increases in determining their need for assistance or otherwise.

summary.text: Requires States to pass along to individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under the Federal-State public assistance programs or under specified other Federal programs, and who are entitled to social security benefits, the full amount of the 1972 and 1974 increases in such benefits, either by disregarding such benefits in determining their need for assistance or otherwise. Makes the same requirement with regard to veterans' benefits and pensions.

titles.title: A bill to require States to pass along to individuals who are recipients of aid or assistance under the Federal-State public assistance programs or under certain other Federal programs, and who are entitled to social security benefits, the full amount of the 1972 and 1974 increases in such benefits, either by disregarding such increases in determining their need for assistance or otherwise.
